name: Heinous Unicorn AR Viewer (Android)
description:
A simple little AR app that lets you place a heinous unicorn in augmented reality. It just stands there and looks around. This was a little exercise using Google ARCore for Unity. ARCore supports only Google Pixel and Samsung Galaxy S8 phones. Android 7.1+ required.

Google ARCore Service Installer (APK)

Install Google's ARCore Service first, or it will just crash when you try to run it. Run this link on your Android or follow instructions here.

To play the full VR Game made for SteamVR: Heinous Unicorn Joust VR.

If you're a developer, here some useful info on making ARCore games in Unity.
